Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_VPS_DISP_GET_DSS_PARAMS   (VPS_DISP_DSS_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0002U)

Get DSS display params IOCTL.

This IOCTL can be used to get the Dss display params. Note: See respective counter comments for details.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN/OUT] Vps_DispDssParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure
#define IOCTL_VPS_DISP_SET_CSC_COEFF   (VPS_DISP_DSS_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0003U)

Set DSS CSC Coefficients IOCTL.

This IOCTL can be used to set the CSC coefficients. Note: Default BT601 coefficients are set.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] const Vps_DssCscCoeff *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure
#define IOCTL_VPS_DISP_SET_DSS_PARAMS   (VPS_DISP_DSS_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0001U)

Set DSS display params IOCTL.

This IOCTL can be used to set the Dss display params. Note: See respective counter comments for details.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] const Vps_DispDssParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure
